attributes.action: Make the Citizenship Card a form of I.D in all sellers of Alcahol
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I'm creating this petition becuase places like pubs and bars and rejecting the citzenship card as a form of I.D. the citzenship card was created by the goverment for over 18s to be allowed to be served in pubs if they haven't got either a driving licence or a valid passport. i urge the PM to ask on this.
